quote: They say every person dies twice. Once when you take your last breath and once when your name is mentioned for the last time.
author: Unknown

quote: People are just as wonderful as sunsets if you let them be. When I look at a sunset, I don’t find myself saying, ‘Soften the orange a bit on the right hand corner.’ I don’t try to control a sunset. I watch with awe as it unfolds.
author: Carl R. Rogers

quote: I much prefer the sharpest criticism of a single intelligent man to the thoughtless approval of the masses.
author: Johannes Kepler

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Fettuccine Alfredo is macaroni and cheese for adults.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: Those who do not move, do not notice their chains.
author: Rosa Luxemburg

quote: Life is a beautiful lie, and death is the painful truth.
author: Unknown

quote: The worst part about being strong is that no one ever asks if you're ok.
author: Accelerator, Railgun

quote: Fake people have an image to maintain. Real people just don't care.
author: Hachiman, Oregairu

quote: The more inexperienced you are, the more you want to show off.
author: Houtarou, Hyouka

quote: In the mind, one's consciousness is just the tip of the iceberg. What lies beneath the surface... the subconscious... is far more vast.
author: Shun, Shinsekai Yori

quote: Life is basically like a soap bubble. It rides on the wind, flying here and there, ...and before you realize it, pop! It's gone. When it's about to disappear, you think that you could've flown a bit higher. But by then, it's already too late.
author: Gintoki, Gintama

quote: If you’re not remembered, then you never existed.
author: Serial Experiments Lain

quote: People die if they are killed.
author: Shirou, Fate/Stay Night

quote: Some things are beautiful exactly because they are unobtainable.
author: Gilgamesh, Fate/Stay Night

quote: Don't let yourself be blinded by fear or anger. Everything is only as it is.
author: Nui, Mushishi

quote: Men only think of their past right before their death, as if they were searching frantically for proof that they were alive.
author: Jet, Cowboy Bebop
